## Scrollbar.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Scrollbar` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(workspace: WorkspaceSvg, horizontal: boolean, opt_pair?: boolean, opt_class?: string, opt_margin?: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg_class.md) | Workspace to bind the scrollbar to. |
|  horizontal | boolean | True if horizontal, false if vertical. |
|  opt\_pair | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> True if scrollbar is part of a horiz/vert pair. |
|  opt\_class | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A class to be applied to this scrollbar. |
|  opt\_margin | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The margin to apply to this scrollbar. |
